name: Gacha_Hell
description:
For people who love gacha!

At the bottom left, input number from 1 to 10. Press the SpawnCards button to spawn cards by the number you put. Press R to reveal cards. Press RevealAll to reveal all cards at once.

Minimum or big bugs might be easily found.

v0.0.1 : Created, Accidentaly moved time 1 years back. (2021.7.22)

v 0.0.2 : Added or edited more sprites, Added sound, Changed InputField to Slider, Edited card chances, Fixed minor bugs, Used the time stone back to normal.  (2021.7.23)
